item.title: DEVELOPMENT recruiting "beta testers"
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

Job: BETA tester
Experience: I have my own server and I play Private Server alot.
Why should I choose you: Because I have my own server, I know all the glitches to look for, so that the future players of your server won’t abuse them.
Will you be active while testing: Yes, I got all week.
comments: I’m sure your server will be awsome with my help. (not that your server needs it)

Read full topic
